name: Magic Awalé 2023
description: African mobile strategy and thinking game based on awale. Awale is an African thinking board game, from the family of sowing games. It is played on a cylindrical board with 12 holes. The holes are divided into two territories, each with 6 squares or houses. It is the most widespread game of the mancala family, a set of African games of the "count and capture" type in which pebbles, seeds or shells are distributed in cups or holes, sometimes dug in the ground. This game belongs to the large family of African sowing games.
